mapper.insert: insert into service_items (item_id, email, business_regi_num, service_name, service_description, required_time, service_price, item_status) values (item_id.nextval, #{email}, #{business_regi_num}, #{service_name}, #{service_description}, #{required_time}, #{service_price}, #{item_status})
mapper.update: update service_items set item_status='0' where email=#{email} and business_regi_num=#{business_regi_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO images (fileName, fileType, filePath, fileSize, upload_time, image_data) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{upload_time}, #{image_data})
mapper.select: select si.* from service_items si join users u on si.email = u.email where u.enable <> '0' and si.item_status <> '0' and required_time = #{time}
